lead_paragraph: The bank benefited from its efforts to offset a rise in the Swiss franc, but its Tier 1 capital ratio, a measure of the bank’s health, slipped.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Credit Suisse Stock Falls Despite Rise in Profits
headline.main: Credit Suisse Profit Rises 23 Percent in First Quarter

snippet: The bank benefited from its efforts to offset a rise in the Swiss franc, but its Tier 1 capital ratio, a measure of the bank’s health, slipped.
